name: Surka
description:
A platforming and puzzle game that brings humour and fun to the player, you are going to face robots, traps and the government, up to your victory.

During the game you will have challenges that will need your entire arsenal to be completed, use different weapons and movement options in addition to your brain and the scenario, in your revolution!

Wiki (portuguese): https://surka.fandom.com/pt-br/wiki/Surka_Wiki
